long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
You sit down at the computer, and you swear you'll be productive. Next thing you know, it's twelve hours later. You've checked your email, updated your Facebook status, blown through 200 pages of Reddit, read every article in your Twitter feed, looked up your favorite band on Wikipedia, vanity googled yourself, cyber-stalked your ex, browsed through all your high-school crushes' Instagram feeds, and lost a week's pay playing online poker.

What you haven't done is WORK.

âœ¦ What is StayFocusd?

StayFocusd is a productivity extension for Google Chrome that helps you stay focused on work by restricting the amount of time you can spend on time-wasting websites. It provides analytics to help you understand and control your internet usage, ensuring you remain productive throughout the day.

â­ Our Features â­

ğŸ“Š Website usage history: Get statistics of your daily website usage history.
ğŸš« Configurable blocking: Block entire sites, specific subdomains, specific paths, specific pages, or even in-page content (videos, images, forms, etc).
â˜¢ï¸ The Nuclear Option: This powerful feature allows you to block access to websites for the number of hours you specify on the days you choose. Once activated, it cannot be canceled, ensuring you remain focused and productive.
ğŸ“±Require Challenge: To change any settings, you must complete a challenging task. This reduces the temptation to alter settings, helping you stick to your productivity goals.
ğŸ—“ï¸ Active Days/Hours: Customize the days and hours during which StayFocusd will restrict your access to distracting websites. This ensures that your productivity is maintained during critical work periods.
â–¶ï¸ In App Blocking for YouTube: Block all distracting components on YouTube. Hide shorts, comments, recommended videos, etc. 
ğŸ”’ Privacy protection: StayFocusd does not collect personal data from the web pages you visit.

âœ¦ YOU ARE IMPORTANT

We value your feedback! Please rate us 5 stars on the Chrome Web Store to help us grow. Problems? Questions? Suggestions? Effusive praise? Email support@stayfocusd.com

PRIVACY NOTICE:
When you install StayFocusd, it will ask you to grant a number of permissions, including â€œRead and change all your data on the websites you visit.â€ This permission is required in order for StayFocusd to run on any site which you may visitâ€”without this permission, StayFocusd would not be able to block websites. While this permission technically grants StayFocusd the ability to read and change data, we will never collect personal data from the web page content that you are browsing.

This extension is maintained by Sensor Tower.
